ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.INTRO: Hi, I am a front-end developer based in Groß Twülpstedt near Wolfsburg, Germany. I have had the opportunity to gain experience in a wide variety of areas and was finally able to fulfill my dream of working as a software developer. As a huge fan of digitization, I want to use my experience as a software developer to polish up and improve the future in this area. Digitization is the future!
ABOUT_ME.CHARACTER: My character is primarily characterized by calmness, reliability, and the great desire to be able to support others wherever I can.
ABOUT_ME.ATMOSPHERE: I am a very relaxed and at the same time direct guy with whom you always have a fun and pleasant working atmosphere.

MY_SKILLS.HEADLINE: My skills
MY_SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I have grown my frontend development skills that have allowed me to create different real projects.

PORTFOLIO.INTRO: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

EL_POLLO_LOCO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and Salsa bottles to fight against the chickens.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

FORM.MESSAGE_MINLENGTH: Your message must be at least {{ requiredLength }} characters long.
FORM.PRIVACY_TEXT: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
FORM.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your message has been successfully sent!

LIABILITY_CONTENT.TITLE: Liability for content
LIABILITY_CONTENT.TEXT: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of the content...

COPYRIGHT.TITLE: Copyright
COPYRIGHT.TEXT: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law...

DATA_PROTECTION.TITLE: Data protection
DATA_PROTECTION.TEXT: We are committed to protecting your personal data and handling it in compliance with legal regulations, especially the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
DATA_PROTECTION.RESPONSIBLE_TEXT: The responsible party for data processing can be found in the Imprint.
DATA_PROTECTION.COLLECTION: 2. Collection and processing of personal data
DATA_PROTECTION.COLLECTION_TEXT: Personal data such as name, email address, and message are collected through the contact form solely for the purpose of answering your inquiry...
DATA_PROTECTION.SERVER_LOG_TEXT: Our hosting provider, All-Inkl, automatically logs technical details such as your IP address, browser type, and time of access...
DATA_PROTECTION.THIRD_PARTY_TEXT: We do not use tracking or analytics services...
DATA_PROTECTION.RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the use of your personal data...

LIABILITY_LINKS.TITLE: Liability for links
LIABILITY_LINKS.TEXT: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, over whose content we have no influence...
